actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exclude from its coverage certain patients employed by institutions primarily engaged in the care of the sick, the aged, or the mentally ill or defective.

summary.text: Excludes from coverage under the Fair Labor Standards Act patients employed for three hours a day or less by institutions primarily engaged in the care of the sick, the aged, or the mentally ill or defective.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exclude from its coverage certain patients employed by institutions primarily engaged in the care of the sick, the aged, or the mentally ill or defective.
